fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame

Class Temple

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame.Temple

  • public class Temple
extends Object
    The temple is where the magic happens. The winning conditions are checked here. Preaching to the congregation is also needed to keep the overall scepticism low.
    Author:
    iah1016

    • Method Detail

      • preach

        public boolean preach(Player player,
                      Sect sect)
        As in every turn the members' scepticism increases, some impeding procedures ought to be carried out. Bring your A-game and deliver a lights-out-passionate performance to your precious flock.
        Parameters:
        player - You the man (or woman).
        sect - Your greatest achievement.
        Returns:
        Currently, returns true unless the congregation size is zero.

      • offerSodaToAllMembers

        public boolean offerSodaToAllMembers(Player player)
        This is it. No turning back. If your charisma is high enough, everyone is going to ascend to the next level.
        Parameters:
        player - The chief him- or herself.
        Returns:
        If you've high enough charisma, you win. If not, nothing happens.

      • buyTicketToParadiseIsland

        public boolean buyTicketToParadiseIsland(Player player,
                                         Sect sect)
        A one-way ticket to Paradise (some obscure island in the western Pacific) and only you are going. You have taught your flock well and now they can manage themselves. You will take a reasonable reward of 100 percent of the Sect's balance with you.
        Parameters:
        player - The grand guru.
        sect - Meh. They will do fine.
        Returns:
        If there is enough moolah in the bank, then you win. If not, then nothing happens.
